name: The Gloomvale King
description:
!!!!!Windows and Mac hardware test demo available for download!!!!!!!

The more feedback I get the better. So I can design it even  further to get the most out of older CPU and GPU

An open world fantasy game for windows, power pc OSX and Intel.

Drawing on inspiration from classic games like Daggerfall/Hexen/Heretic/Diablo. A unique open world featuring 2d and 3d textures/sprites.

Built in unity  version 2.6 to suit older video cards down to 16mb (Hopefully!)

Native support for osx 10.3.9 and up (Universal binary)

Windows 2000 and up

Unique soundtrack and ambient sounds

Set 80 years after the defeat of the black magic. A volcanic eruption destroys the grand mages cave. The chest of light is presumed lost and the grand mage dead. 

Meanwhile the king of the United Realms is struck by a terminal sickness. Using unconventional methods to prolong his life he creates and wields a new magic by practising ancient rituals.  He unintentionally unleashes forces beyond his control. Thus creating 'The Gloomvale'. A land where crops wither and die. A land where water turns black and foul. 

As his influence spreads the days grow dark and evil takes hold. The once clear skies are clouded by a thick green fog. One by one the people of the realms fall under his spell.

A lone traveller arrives in Hemwick after his caravan is attacked in the forest.  Will the traveller survive The Gloomvale?
